繃不住.definition: (Internet slang) can't contain oneself; unable to bear; can't help (doing sth)

繃巴吊拷.definition: variant of 繃扒吊拷|绷扒吊拷[beng1 ba1 diao4 kao3]

繃扒吊拷.definition: to strip, tie up, hang and beat sb, an ancient torture technique

繃著臉.definition: to have a taut face; to pull a long face; to look displeased
